services.title: Event Venue Rental
services.description: Rent a spacious venue for your gaming convention, tech conference, or expo.
services.details: Includes access to a fully-equipped venue with seating, audiovisual equipment, and catering options.

services.title: Event Promotion Package
services.description: Boost attendance and visibility with our event promotion package.
services.details: Includes social media promotion, email marketing, and targeted advertising.

services.title: Hackathon Support
services.description: Get expert support for organizing and hosting hackathons.
services.details: Includes mentorship, technical support, and prize sponsorship.

services.title: Gaming Tournament Setup
services.description: Organize and host gaming tournaments with our tournament setup service.
services.details: Includes tournament bracket management, gaming consoles, and referees.

services.title: Tech Conference Speaker Booking
services.description: Book industry experts and keynote speakers for your tech conference.
services.details: Includes speaker selection, logistics, and presentation coordination.

services.title: Exhibition Booth Design
services.description: Design and set up eye-catching exhibition booths for your expo.
services.details: Includes booth design, branding, and setup.
